pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automated Schema on Read // Provides schema-on-read tools including a single function call (e.g., schemaOnRead('filename')) that reads text ('TXT'), comma separated value ('CSV'), raster image ('BMP', 'PNG', 'GIF', 'TIFF', and 'JPG'), R data ('RDS'), HDF5 ('H5'), NetCDF ('CS'), spreadsheet ('XLS', 'XLSX', 'ODS', and 'DIF'), Weka Attribute- Relation File Format ('ARFF'), Epi Info ('REC'), SPSS ('SAV'), Systat ('SYS'), and Stata ('DTA') files. It also recursively reads folders (e.g., schemaOnRead('folder')), returning a nested list of the contained elements.
